caption.p: Interaction of SARS-COV-2 with the ACE2 receptor, target organs and its effect on them. Abbreviations: ACE2 = Angiotensin converting enzyme 2, RAAS = Inhibitors of the renin-angiotensin-aldosterone system, ATR1 = receptor type 1 losartan. ALT = alanine aminotransferase, AST = aspartate aminotransferase.
